name: Grilled Meat Skewers With Bay Leaves
keywords: bay leaves, beef tenderloin, pork shoulder, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 to 2 pounds pork or lamb shoulder, or beef tenderloin (filet mignon), cut into 1 1/2- to 2-inch chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Start charcoal or gas grill, with the fire moderately hot, and the rack about 4 inches from the heat. If using wood skewers, soak in water while you prepare the meat.
Toss meat with oil, salt, pepper and garlic. Skewer meat alternately with bay leaves; if leaves break, jam between meat chunks.
Grill the meat 2 to 5 minutes per side, depending on the fire's heat and how well done you like your meat. Remove and serve.
